name: The stigma of THE Suleiman
description:
When THE Prophet Suleiman answered  the 10 questions asked by his father THE Prophet David correctly, the ring that THE Prophet Adam wore was given to him.

It symbolizes the creation and destruction of the material realm. (Water-Air-Earth-Fire) One of the triangles represents the positive aspects of life and the other triangle represents the negative aspects. (Contrasts)

It has also been used as a motif on various objects, as the belief that the devil cannot enter the place is dominant. The stigma of THE Suleiman is a symbol of spiritual protection as well as statehood and domination.

Whoever has the stigma is Suleiman.
